Context:
The Daystrom Child Care Centre opened in September, 2014 and is located at 25 Daystrom Drive, Toronto, Ontario, M9M 2K8. It offers before and after school programs for kindergarten and school aged children enrolled in the Daystrom Public School. The centre serves as a model lab school for the diploma and degree programs in the School of Early Childhood and provides a training ground for college students.

Manager's name: Effie Ntanou
Manager's email: Effie.Ntanou@georgebrown.ca
Centre phone numbers: 647-823-3956 or 647-284-1392
Age groups accommodated: 3.8 to 10 years
Hours of operation: 8:00 a.m. - 5:30 p.m.
Food is catered by "Yummy Catering"
The centre is approved for the CWELCC program and follows the guidelines from Toronto Childrenâ€™s Services in its implementation. Fees are inclusive of all services, including extracurcurricular activities and transportation. Children under 6 are eligible for fee reduction. To join the waitlist, please complete a form and sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.

Contact information for general inquiries: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice.
